activities: mEGO  USES PERSONAL INFORMATION FROM THE EU FOR THE  PURPOSES OF PROVIDING ITS PRODUCTS AND SERVICES TO THE EU-BASED RESIDENTS  PROVIDING SUCH PERSONAL INFORMATION, AND FOR SALES AND MARKETING ACTIVITIES  RELATED TO ITS PRODUCTS AND SERVICES.
